extension.description: Modern vertical navigation interface for PlexMod (PM4K). Adds Netflix-style vertical scrolling to your Plex libraries. Requires PlexMod (script.plexmod) to be installed and configured.
Interfaz de navegación vertical moderna para PlexMod (PM4K). Añade scroll vertical estilo Netflix a tus bibliotecas Plex. Requiere PlexMod (script.plexmod) instalado y configurado.
extension.disclaimer: Requires PlexMod (PM4K) installed. This is an unofficial addon.
Requiere PlexMod (PM4K) instalado. Este es un addon no oficial.
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2025-12-25) - Initial release - Vertical navigation interface - Netflix-style layout - Integrates with PM4K libraries - Uses PM4K authentication - Modern animations
